attributes.action: Rioters. We call for action to halt this crime now
attributes.additional_details: We, the UK people, call for the use of water cannon, rubber bullets, and a lot tougher stance against these Riots we are seeing in the news recently, and to ensure any future actions like this are quelled using force to a) act as a deterent, and b) stop the troublemakers in there tracks. There needs tobe a quick decisive method of dealing with these sporadic events. The time has ended to treat criminals with feathers. The fear of arrest does nothing, lets up our antics to stop it NOW.
